name: Qustodio
overview:
Qustodio is a new innovative app that helps parents protect kids online. Qustodio helps parents understand & manage how their kids use the internet, and protects them against dangerous content, cyberbullying and predators.

Here’s a few of the reasons why we’re proud of Qustodio:

  • It does true social network monitoring of your child’s friends and connections
  • It classifies websites dynamically and can pick out bad content on sites immediately
  • It has a cool and informative monitoring dashboard that’s easy to use from any device
  • It’s child proof
  • It’s FREE.

What can parents do with Qustodio? -Understand how their kids use the internet

  • Protect their privacy & reputation online
  • Block dangerous online content
  • Manage their kids internet time
